modShortDescription: This 7 Days to Die mod removes grazing hits from all weapons, so either you hit the zombies for real, or you don't at all. Makes it easier on vehicles too.
modDescription:
Tired of not knowing whether you actually hit the zombie, or just pissed it off? This 7 Days to Die mod removes grazing hits from all [weapons](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-weapons/), so either you hit the [zombies](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-zombies/) for real, or you don’t at all. Makes it easier on vehicles too. Who hasn’t hit them while fighting a zombie?

**[Download](https://github.com/dcsobral/7d2d/releases/download/2.0.0/No.Glancing.Blows-1.0.zip)**

The forum topic of the mod is [here](https://community.7daystodie.com/topic/17350-dcsobrals-mods/).

**Credits:** [Dcsobral](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/dcsobral/)
